identity.name: DeepTutor
identity.description: A research assistant that feels like a pristine library, not a chaotic tech dashboard.

usage.citations: Use Accent (#E36414) for citation numbers to make them pop like margin notes.
usage.sidebar: Use Muted (#F0F0EB) for the sidebar background to separate it from the main 'paper' area.
usage.ai_response: Keep AI text in Foreground (#1A1A1A) on Background (#F9F9F7) for maximum readability.

visual_enhancers.texture: Add a subtle noise texture to the background to simulate high-quality paper. opacity-50 mix-blend-multiply.
visual_enhancers.borders: 1px solid var(--border). Use sharp corners (rounded-sm) or minimal rounding (rounded-md) for a technical feel. Avoid fully rounded 'pill' buttons unless for tags.
visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use sparingly. Only for sticky headers or floating citation previews. backdrop-blur-md bg-white/80.

dashboard.grid: Use a 'Bento' grid for the 'New Session' screen showing recent files, suggested queries, and stats.

chat_interface.messages: Distinct separation between User (aligned right, subtle bg) and AI (aligned left, transparent bg, full width).
chat_interface.input_area: Floating at the bottom, detached from the edge, with a strong shadow.

file_manager.view: Grid of cards with file type icons (PDF, DOCX) prominent.
file_manager.upload: Large drag-and-drop zone with dashed border and 'upload' illustration.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 rounded-md px-6 py-2 font-medium transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/80 rounded-md px-6 py-2 font-medium
buttons.ghost: hover:bg-muted text-muted-foreground hover:text-foreground rounded-md px-4 py-2

cards.base: bg-card text-card-foreground border border-border shadow-sm rounded-lg p-6

inputs.style: bg-transparent border-b-2 border-input focus:border-primary focus:ring-0 rounded-none px-0 py-2 transition-colors placeholder:text-muted-foreground/50

hero_background.description: Abstract light geometric pattern for subtle backgrounds

upload_illustration.description: Abstract flow for upload area visual interest

instructions_to_main_agent.general: Implement the 'Modern Academic' persona. Avoid generic SaaS templates. Think 'Digital Library' meets 'Swiss Design'.
setup: Install fonts: IBM Plex Sans and Fraunces.
Configure Tailwind colors in tailwind.config.js using the palette provided.
Add the noise texture to the body background in index.css.

specific_pages.landing: Use the 'researcher_hero' image with a split layout. Typography should be big and bold (Fraunces).
specific_pages.dashboard: Implement the Sidebar with the 'Muted' background. The main chat area should be 'Background' (#F9F9F7).
specific_pages.chat: Ensure citations are clickable and distinct. Use the 'Accent' color for the citation markers [1], [2].

instructions_to_main_agent.accessibility: Ensure text contrast is high. The primary text is #1A1A1A, which is safe on #F9F9F7.
instructions_to_main_agent.testing: Add data-testid to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, file cards).

UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
